body_html:
The HessianVectorProduct, if I understand correctly, computes the inner product of the Hessian with some vector which is useful for some optimizers that make use of the Hessian for more efficient steps. It does not allow for the evaluation of the Hessian itself but I may have misunderstood.

I have restricted to the hessian with respect to one dimension because the reshaping necessary to do it for arbitrary-shape tensors would be quite involved.
